Get game advanced box score information

cfb_game_box_advanced.Rd

Get game advanced box score information

cfb_game_box_advanced(game_id, long = FALSE)

Arguments

game_id

(Integer required): Game ID filter for querying a single game Can be found using the cfbscrapR::cfb_game_info() function
long

(Logical default `FALSE`): Return the data in a long format.

Examples


cfb_game_box_advanced(401114233)
#> 2020-09-05 16:34:28: Scraping game advanced box score data for game_id '401114233'...
